content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. I'm open to discussing the rental price, but I'm also looking to maximize my gains. Could you please make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month, but I want to know if there are any additional fees or charges that you need me to be aware of?

Also, I want to know if there are any restrictions on the number of people who can live in the apartment?
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your offer, Bo Li. I'm happy to accept it. As for additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit that needs to be paid upfront, as well as monthly utilities like electricity, gas, and water. These costs are typically the responsibility of the tenant.

As for restrictions on the number of people who can live in the apartment, I would need to know the specifics of your situation. Generally, I prefer to keep the number of tenants to a minimum, as it can make maintenance and repairs more difficult. However, I'm open to discussing this further and finding a solution that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I will pay the security deposit and utilities, and I will make sure not to exceed the number of people allowed in the apartment. I agree to the terms and conditions you have.

I am ready to sign the lease agreement. How can I proceed?

Also, if I have any questions or concerns in the future, how can I reach out to you?

Thank you for your help, Mister Heine.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Bo Li. I'm glad we could come to an agreement that works for both of us. To proceed with signing the lease agreement, you can simply send me a message confirming your acceptance of the terms and conditions, and I will send you the necessary paperwork.

If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. You can send me a message or give me a call at my convenience. I'm always here to help and ensure that you have a positive experience with my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
